DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding Involvement Level Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text statement to describe the extent of the pathologic spread of prostate cancer (pT2) to indicate the level of involvement for disease that is confined to the prostate on pathologic evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding Involvement Level
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)_To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Property.preferredDefinition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.:A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

Concepts.definition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.
A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by B.McClure-Shimel. mc 1/18/12

ValueDomain.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)_The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer limited to one-half or less of one lobe of the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT2a TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer limited to one-half or less of one lobe of the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer involving more than one-half of one lobe, but not both lobes of the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT2b TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer involving more than one-half of one lobe, but not both lobes of the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer involving both lobes of the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT2c TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer involving both lobes of the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding Stage
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th Ed.):The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)
The extent of a cancer in the body.
